name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Remote Data Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, leveraging strong **technical skills** in **data analysis**, **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Proficient in utilizing **remote technologies** to ensure seamless job execution and monitoring, with hands-on expertise in both **frontend** and **backend** development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Demonstrated ability in conducting **risk assessments** and optimizing applications for **team collaboration** and **communication skills**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms, supporting predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, while enhancing problem-solving capabilities through innovative solutions. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices and event-driven architectures with CI/CD pipelines.

Highly skilled in operating within compliance frameworks, ensuring alignment with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in MLOps practices, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, all while effectively multitasking in fast-paced environments.
